</MembersIndexItem>

  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/insertfunctionstrategy">InsertFunctionStrategy</a></>}>

</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/insertcfgstrategy">InsertCFGStrategy</a></>}>

</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/insertphistrategy">InsertPHIStrategy</a></>}>
Strategy to insert PHI Nodes at the head of each basic block. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/insertphistrategy/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sinkinstructionstrategy">SinkInstructionStrategy</a></>}>
Strategy to select a random instruction and add a new sink (user) to it to increate data dependency. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sinkinstructionstrategy/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/shuffleblockstrategy">ShuffleBlockStrategy</a></>}>
Strategy to randomly select a block and shuffle the operations without affecting data dependency. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/shuffleblockstrategy/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// configurable set of strategies. Some common strategies are also included</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fuzzer-friendly (de)serialization functions are also provided, as these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are usually needed when mutating IR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Provide a weight to bias towards choosing this strategy for a mutation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The value of the weight is arbitrary, but a good default is &quot;the number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// distinct ways in which this strategy can mutate a unit&quot;. This can also be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// used to prefer strategies that shrink the overall size of the result when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// we start getting close to \\c MaxSize.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Fuzzer friendly interface for the llvm bitcode parser.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param Data Bitcode we are going to parse</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param Size Size of the &#39;Data&#39; in bytes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\return New module or nullptr in case of error</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    LLVMContext &amp;Context);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Fuzzer friendly interface for the llvm bitcode printer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\param M Module to print</span></CodeLine>
